channel.title: Help with java
channel.description: I used to code back in the day.. but now its been awhile and java isnt working on my computer. How do i get all the clients to reconize java. Because when i open run.bat it just appears and dissapers....

item.title: Help with java
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

Anti Pizza:

I used to code back in the day… but now its been awhile and java isnt working on my computer. How do i get all the clients to reconize java. Because when i open run.bat it just appears and dissapers…

First add “pause” to your run.bat code then ope and see the error.
And if it says Java is not reconized the download java.
Or you may need to download JDK from the java website.
Have you set your variables?
If you havent look at the pinned guide in Server downloads section

Read full topic
